name: holenav
description: New mapper for make benefit of the glorious EVE community. Currently in early prototyping.

scripts.start: docker compose up -d mongo server web && npm run logs
scripts.start:test: docker compose up -d mongo server-test web-test
scripts.stop: docker compose down && docker compose -f compose.ci.yaml down
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:server && npm run test:e2e
scripts.e2e: npm run start:test && cd e2e && npm test
scripts.e2e:open: npm run start:test && cd e2e && npm start
scripts.lint: cd web && npm run lint && cd ../server && npm run lint && cd ../e2e && npm run lint
scripts.preversion: if [ $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) != 'main' ]; then exit 1; fi

author: Joonas HÃ¤kkinen <joonashak@proton.me>
